channel.title: sausages on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in sausages on Recipes

item.title: macaroni and Vienna sausages
item.description: 1-2 pound macaroni 1-2 pounds of grated American cheese 2 cups white sauce 2 cans of Vienna sausages Cook the macaroni in plenty of salt water, until soft. Remove from heat, drain them and pour warm water again. Drain again. Make a white sauce with the recipe we offer you lower, and add the grated cheese. Cut into wheels several sausages, leaving 6 whole for adornment. Combine the macaroni, sauce, and sausage slices.

item.title: rice with sausages
item.description: sofrito 5 split sausages 1 1-2 pounds of rice 1 teaspoon salt 3 tablespoons butter with annotto 3 cups water Add the sausages, rice and butter with sofrito and cook for two minutes. Add the water and season to taste. Cook until the rice is a little dry, lower the heat, stir two or three times and keep covered until serving.
